lexUnit.name: gulp.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: Swallow (drink or food) quickly or in large mouthfuls, often audibly. He smiled and gulped his tea.

sentence.text: Herr Nordern gulped his beer and drummed his fingers on the table .
Doyle gulped beer , standing by the phone and watching the silent football .
I gulped down the last drop of my beer and helped Amanda on with her coat .
Russell gulped another mouthful from his pint of beer and ripped open a bag of crisps .
I could gulp my beer
He gulped some coffee , and in the shop bought biscuits , mineral water and bananas .
He gulped down the coffee and picked up his pen .
Zen gulped down the rest of his coffee and announced that he had to be going .
Cornelius gulped his coffee .
` Never mind that , " Herr Nordern gulped his brandy .
He did n't make any sort of sign of recognition , but he gulped his drink with urgency .
After she had gulped the pancake , she picked up a shrimp and ate that saying : ` I like that . "
She gulped the hot tea , put the cup down , took hold of a sandwich and sank hungry white teeth into it .
Corbett gulped the rich , red wine , relishing the way it warmed his stomach .
Various items get gulped up into my mouth , and after skilful massage with tongue and teeth I transfer them to the plate for additional sculpture with knife and fork and spoon .
She was obviously very hungry because she always gulped her food down like there was no tomorrow .
He kept gulping it down till he made himself ill ;
She was roused from this reverie seconds later when he gulped the last of the juice and said , ` I know what Faye 's ` few minutes " mean .
Lucien gulped the water greedily .
Maura gulped at her drink .
A spoon was pushed between her gritted teeth and Nina gulped at the bitter medicine , hoping it would bring her release from the agony that was wearing her down .
She gulped at the whisky , then thought better of it .
Mr Carver gulped through his tea , then muttered , ` Well , I 'm away .
He gulped down greedily the last few drops of red wine .
As she walked to the weighing room , she gulped down the three pills .
He stretched his throat and gulped down a third of the liquid in the glass .
Gerd gulps down the food , and then coughs a few times , each time a little louder , and exhibiting a little more distress .
He gulped down the spread of cold meats eagerly but chewed slowly , like the old man he had become .
He gulped down more wine and turned to applaud as the next cabaret act came on stage .
I gulp down the orange drink and order another one .
Brian Wilson , the former Beach Boy who ingested Grade A drugs at the same rate his fellow Californians gulped down vitamins has brought out his autobiography .
Most flesh-eating reptiles have simple spikes that prevent them from chewing their prey ; they have to gulp it down whole and then remain in a torpor for days or weeks to digest the meal .
